definition: directrix line of a parabola/guide line
to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of

sentences.english: An united space datum line has been given.

sentences.english: When you find your line in Headstand, it's a beautiful thing.

sentences.english: So, that right there gets you pretty close to a consistent baseline.

The outer barrel of the syringe should be transparent enough; bench line can be seen distinctly.

sentences.english: Thus, in Beijing, 60,000 yuan in low-income families is the standard line.

definition: axis of symmetry/central axis (in Chinese architecture)
modulus (distance from the origin in polar coordinates)
intercept (the point at which a line crosses the x- or y-axis)
